title: Literacy Learning Ecosystem Design from a Postcolonial Perspective

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy, digital literacy, and general understanding of multicultural societies
context.additional_context: Exploring decolonial literacy practices centered on smartphone-based learning activities

learning_goals: Learners explain at least three impacts of postcolonial perspectives on literacy education.
Learners design boundary-crossing learning ecosystem proposals using online collaboration tools.
Learners produce project outcomes analyzing how linguistic boundaries influence knowledge production in scientific fields.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
